other_tests.findings: Cerebrospinal fluid analysis showed normal cell counts and normal protein and glucose levels; no organisms were evident on Gramâ€™s or acid-fast bacilli staining.
Generalized low-amplitude theta-range slowing without superimposed epileptiform activity.
Microscopical examination revealed slightly hypercellular, gliotic white matter with granular eosinophilic material and patchy loss of myelin.
